page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: { LIFTON}is a village with a population of approx 1,000.It is bisected by the A.30 trunk road the main highway between Exeter and Cornwall. It has a number of basic amenities including a Primary School,Post Office,Public Houses,Public Telephones,Church,Chapel,Police Houses and 3 shops,a Guest Home and two Residential Hotels.Athough small by national standards{Lifton}is quite big for the local area. There are two factories,Ambrosia(milk products)and Dalgetys(animal food)that provide employment oportunities. The surrounding area is farmland mainly given to dairy or beef and sheep production.The topography is undulating with a river valley having been cut by the Rivers Lyd,Thrushell and{Wolf.Lifton}is at the confluenceof these rivers
